name: Archbishop Pinthroy
aura: Increase Ally ACC in in all Battles by 50

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Transfers 1 random debuff from this Champion to the target. Also has a 75% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.
skills.name: Author of Fates
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.desc:
Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies. Places a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. 

Champions from the Demonspawn, Undead Horde, and Knights Revenant Factions cannot resist these debuffs.
skills.name: Holy Word

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%

skills.desc: Heals all allies by 30% of their MAX HP, then places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. If 4 or more allies are alive, also places a [Shield] buff on each ally for 2 turns equal to 30% of their MAX HP.
skills.name: Gleam of Glory

skills.desc: Removes all [Decrease DEF] debuffs and [Weaken] debuffs from this Champion at the start of each turn.
